metadata.name: FERRYMEN #1
metadata.description: Weaved by NYX, the Mother Night, Souls are the indivisible essence that defines us. They cross into the shadow lands when we sleep, meditate, daydream and when we die. Corrupted Wyverns and other creatures sweep these lands preying on travelers. There are those who dedicate their existence to guide and protect the crossing. They go by the name FERRYMEN.
